website_summaries.verdict: While kids rave about being able to design the board, parents wish the foot straps/bindings were made to stand up to typical wear and tear.
pros: Stands out for being customizable, as beginners will appreciate being able to design their own graphics for the board
cons: The bindings aren't nearly as tough as the board and have been reported by numerous unhappy consumers to break

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the delivery/packing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Over all this will work for what my kids need it for. What I’m not happy about is the way this product was packed or lack there of. The shipping labels were put directly on the board. We ordered 2 for our twins one came with the markers and One did not. When the labels were removed from the board not all of the sticker came off and without ruining it even more some of the sticker are covering parts of the board that are meant to be colored.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Bad bindings, appeared to be used...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this board for my 6 year old son for Christmas. The board arrived and upon inspection one of the bindings would not stay closed. There are a few knobs on one end which "clip" into holes on the other end of the binding strap. The holes are too big and the binding just pops right open even with no foot in the binding. Junk. The board also had a big gash in the bottom and a bunch of smaller scratches on it. The label was also taped on like it had been removed. It seems like the board had been used and returned. I sent it back. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: $15 more expensive than it needs to be.
customer_reviews.text: This product ships from Dicks Sportingly Goods and it’s about $15 cheaper if you buy it straight from Dick’s.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel teRiele

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers we were disappointed to find the decal on the board was ripped and bubbles when it arrived. See photos. I didn’t have enough time to return this before my daughter’s birthday so I gave it to her and explained we could exchange it. She was too excited to color it, so she decided to keep it anyway. I just want to caution other potential buyers so they understand the risk of ordering a damaged product.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Color your own design
customer_reviews.text: So my kids loved these you can customize them and let them draw and color it in. which they loved! The only thing it the plastic gets scratched easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W

customer_reviews.title: My son really enjoyed being able to color and decorate this on his ...
customer_reviews.text: My son really enjoyed being able to color and decorate this on his own. We have had since Christmas with no problems with straps, etc. with mild to moderate use and abuse.
customer_reviews.author: bfrisque

customer_reviews.title: One happy boy!!💙💙
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for Christmas, he LOVED it and that he could color it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Built very cheap
customer_reviews.text: For the price this product was terrible. First time using it the foot straps came right off. Its very unstable. The picture is deceiving, it looks sturdy, it is not at all.this is more like a 20 dollar board
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: Looked used
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and cheap looking. Plastic looked worn and scratched as if it was used. Wasn't expensive but even for the price it was not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken in one day
customer_reviews.text: Great size and weight for my son to learn on, but after 1 day and maybe 10-15 times down smaller hills, one of the rivets is already coming off. Will be looking into other options for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: On our second board and the bolts that hold the ...
customer_reviews.text: On our second board and the bolts that hold the bindings on keep pulling through the plastic bindings. For the price I would of thought we wouldn’t already be on our second one.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this snowboard!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this snowboard. It is perfect for a beginner. And he got to color it himself which is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: K S 42

customer_reviews.title: Quickly and carelessly assembled but the durability of the product is pretty
customer_reviews.text: product came with bubbles in the vinyl graphic. Quickly and carelessly assembled but the durability of the product is pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hall

customer_reviews.title: He loved it ( I tried it too)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old. He loved it ( I tried it too). Kept him outside for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Ltoma

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Very quick to respond to an issue with the product and offered replacement immediately! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Exactly as described. My granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: susan jarrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This board is perfect for my 12 year old who is learning to snowboard!
customer_reviews.author: joanne

customer_reviews.title: Brittle bindings
customer_reviews.text: Bindings were broken when my son opened the box on his birthday. Hard to review beyond that because he never was able to use the board. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska5032

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money and expectation. A backyard board for sure.
customer_reviews.text: OK for the money. More for backyard and easy use. I have (2) for our yard and the 1 think I don't like is the screw heads protrude out of the bottom of board and are pretty sharp. Typically when used the kids wear gloves but I filed down a bit to lose roughness.
customer_reviews.author: James W Cash

customer_reviews.title: EMSCO Snowboared
customer_reviews.text: Not the board my grandson wanted, but when He recieved it he loved it better than the one he had requested,Better Quality than most others we looked at.
customer_reviews.author: monnasue Bremer

customer_reviews.title: After several tries he was going down the hill like a pro
customer_reviews.text: Grandson couldn't wait to personalize it with the markers & try it out on the new fallen snow even in the frigid weather! After several tries he was going down the hill like a pro. It was a perfect size & gift for our 11 yr. old.
customer_reviews.author: Verna J. Thiede

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery My son is enjoying his new snow board ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery My son is enjoying his new snow board.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hoveland

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awful. As soon as I fasten ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awful. As soon as I fasten the boot and my son puts his foot in it comes undone. He didn't even get to use it because it wouldn't stay on..
customer_reviews.author: bridget

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disapointed with the bindings. They appear to release too easily. The board itself is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Shoshkes

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun for sledging and getting my son ready for snow boarding. I don't think I'd take this down a resort mountain
customer_reviews.author: Jamie J

customer_reviews.title: Great starter board
customer_reviews.text: Super excited to get this starter board out with my 7 year old! Love how he could color it his own way with markers/stickers provided.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: 39.99 price tag
customer_reviews.text: Item came with 39.99 price tag on it. I paid $60
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, we purchased this board for our 11 year old son who weights 107lbs. The boot bindings broke after the first use and is now unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Moira K Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this product but this has to be said. I've been snowboarding over 20 years. This is not a real snowboard. You will not be allowed to take it to any ski area; they will ask you to leave. A real beginner snowboard isn't that expensive, and this toy will not help build any snowboarding skills. Buy this product only if you want something for kids to use in the yard and nowhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Causes Frustration
customer_reviews.text: This board seems to be high quality, and the visual design is great. My boys had a very difficult time using these, as snow would get caught on the bottom, and pack together. They were never able to make it down even a small sledding hill with these snowboards
customer_reviews.author: MomOfThreeBoys

customer_reviews.title: They love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my kids from Dick's Sporting Goods for 39.99. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son gets frustrated as the foot strap keeps undoing !!!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

product_meta.title: EMSCO Group – Graffiti Snowboard – Great for Beginners – For Kids Ages 5-15 – Design your Own Board Graphic – Solid Core Construction – Adjustable Step-In Bindings
product_meta.description:
Let your children learn and enjoy snowboarding with Emsco’s Grafitti Snowboard.

Made of a solid polypropylene construction, this children’s step-in binding snowboard has a sturdy make-up that makes learning snowboarding a breeze. This product’s extreme durability and resilience are guaranteed. 

This snowboard is appropriate for children ages 5 to 15 and is perfect for entry-level snowboarding. Beginners will find the ergonomic design helpful in their quest to learn this exciting snow sport. This snowboard has step-in bindings that are adjustable for children of all ages. The bindings will lock into place after adjusting, so youngsters of all different sizes can fit. This ensures safety, as kids will always be attached to the snowboard and won’t fall off while boarding and has a weight limit of 95 lb. 

The amazing surface of this board boasts hip and trendy designs. The board’s surface works as a canvas for any permanent marker, so kids can either draw their own designs or color the existing graphics. Both markers and stickers are included for kids to design their own graphics. 

The Grafitti Snowboard can be used to practice beginner snowboarding techniques. It is user-friendly, so kids will be able to ride it without feeling any pressure. It allows children to familiarize themselves with the feel of being on a snowboard before taking it to the slopes. This is the perfect holiday gift for both girls and boys who are looking to try snowboarding. It also helps children learn to snow skate.
Parents who are looking for a functional toy snowboard with cool designs should buy their kids Emsco’s Grafitii Snowboard today.
feature_bullets: IDEAL FOR BEGINNER SNOWBOARDERS – This snowboard is appropriate for children ages 5 to 15. It is perfect for entry-level snowboarding, making it a great fit for novice kids.
CUSTOMIZE AND DESIGN YOUR OWN GRAPHICS – The amazing surface of this board boasts hip and trendy designs.
SOLID, QUALITY CONSTRUCTION – Made of a solid polypropylene construction, this kids’ snowboard showcases excellent workmanship.

ADJUSTABLE BINDINGS – This snowboard has step-in bindings that are adjustable for children of all ages. It will lock into place after adjusting, so youngsters and tweens of different sizes can fit in without any worries.
TEACHES KIDS BASIC TECHNIQUES – The Grafitti Snowboard can be used to practice easy moves and novice tricks. It’s user-friendly, so kids will be able to ride it without feeling any pressure.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
